General.Name: Pontus Protein Ltd
General.Description: Pontus Protein Ltd., an agricultural food and technology company, which grows and commercializes water lentil protein. It offers Pure Plant Protein Powder, a plant protein for aquaponics farming. The company was formerly known as Pontus Water Lentils Ltd. Pontus Protein Ltd. was incorporated in 2018 and is based in Surrey, Canada.
